video_identification.title: Violent SETTLER attacks across the WEST BANK - End the violence now!

extracted_metadata.description: Avi Dabush, survivor of the October 7th massacre by Hamas, calls for an end to Jewish terror in the West Bank upon Palestinians. Welcoming the ceasefire and hostage deal in Gaza, giving respite to Palestinians and Israelis alike, we cannot allow the situation in the West Bank to worsen.
